{{Lang|'''Yumemiru Wood'''|ja={{Rubi|夢見材}}|ja_rm=Yumemiru-zai}} is obtained by cutting down Sakura Trees in [[Narukami Island]]. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Yumemiru Wood can be found near [[Inazuma City]], near the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]], and on [[Amakane Island]]. There are also a few Sakura Trees in [[Araumi]].

==Craft Usage==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Trivia==
* After previously being used for an expensive dye that required a hundred Sakura Trees for just one kimono, the Electro Archon protected Sakura Trees by preventing them from being used in dye-making.<ref>{{Ref/Furnishing|The Precious Pink of Spring}}</ref>
